title: Safiya Sirota
text:
About
I am a pre-doctoral fellow in Biostatistics at Columbia University’s Mailman School of Public Health. I received by B.A. in Mathematics and Psychology from Wellesley College in 2021.
My research interests include causal inference, social determinants of health, and mental health and substance use disorder treatment. I am also enthusiastic about effective data visualization and data ethics. My CV can be found here.

title: Safiya Sirota
